Class Flight

java.lang.Object
A4_Flights.Flight
Direct Known Subclasses:
TrainingFlight
public class Flight
extends java.lang.Object
Flight - a nonstop flight departing from the home airport Flight is the parent class for Training, Cargo, and Passenger Flights
